name: Cuentas Por Cobrar Multimoneda
query:
select 
a.posting_date as "Fecha::200",
IFNULL(a.name, 'TOTAL') as "Folio:Link/Sales Invoice:120", 
a.customer as "Cliente:Link/Customer:450", 
SUM(a.grand_total) as "Total Facturado",
a.currency as "Moneda", 
SUM(case when a.currency = 'USD' then NULL when a.currency = 'MXN' then (a.outstanding_amount) / 1 else a.currency end) as "Debe MXN:Currency:", 
SUM(case when a.currency = 'MXN' then NULL when a.currency = 'USD' then (a.outstanding_amount) / a.conversion_rate else a.currency end) as "Debe USD:Currency:"
from
`tabSales Invoice` a 
where a.posting_date >= %(a.from_date)s and a.posting_date <= %(a.to_date)s and a.customer != 'VENTAS DE CONTADO' and a.customer != 'CHARROS' and a.customer != 'VENTAS DE CONTADO - 1' and a.status != 'PAID' and a.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY CUSTOMER, a.name WITH ROLLUP;
